turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, am looking to order pizzas from a new place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me write your order down for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four small pizzas with all of them having thick crust. The toppings are I want I want two of those pizzas to be a jalapeno and pepperoni. And, one of them to be chicken and bacon and then the other to be just a veggie lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. you said 4 small pizzas, all with thick crust, 2 with jalapenos and pepperoni, 1 with chicken and bacon, and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Could you place it for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: done. i've submitted the order for pick up. the pizzas will be ready in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else today?
